bio:
Saga lives and works at the Divine Elegance store. This store is located in the Reach, on the outskirts of Old Hroldan near the banks of the Karth River. Saga's coworkers/coinhabitants at the store are a man named Loki and a woman named Freja. Their high-class store sells all manner of attire for men and women alike, such as dresses, coats, hates, jewelry, and multiple other accessories. They also sell some weapons and armor, which is what Saga specializes in. She is a skilled blacksmith.
Saga has striking blue eyes and long thick blonde hair. She usually wears one of a variety of sets of armor, which tend to be functional and pleasing to the eye.
name: Saga
